title: Which method limits influence of unknown variables

content.question: Researchers at a large medical center are exploring some treatments for anorexia nervosa. They want to be sure they control for variables such as age, income, and gender in their research. Which of the following methods best limits the influence of unknown variables in an experiment?

topic.text: 5.4: Selection of Categories of Psychological Disorders

skill.text: 2.B: Evaluate the appropriate use of research design elements in experimental methodology.
